title: Gungarri woman
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Butterflies, the moon and big cups of tea.
description: Linda is a Gungarri woman, and she has breast cancer. With this diagnosis you see life differently, butterflies, the moon and big cups of tea that become part of life's healing.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000396; Voices from the Riverlands: Njernda Project; Active; 2005
